**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 38 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 36 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 33 [Rumin Purgo](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2148) **Source** [Pathfinder #184: The Ghouls Hunger](/Sources.aspx?ID=147) pg. 42 **Perception** +17; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23) **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Gnomish](/Languages.aspx?ID=5), [Kelish](/Languages.aspx?ID=38), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20) **Skills** [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +22, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +22, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +22, [Mechitar Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +20, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +20, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +21, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +23 **Str** +0 **Dex** +4 **Con** +2 **Int** +3 **Wis** +2 **Cha** +5 **Items** [_bag of holding IV_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=249), _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [light mace](/Weapons.aspx?ID=5)_, key to all locks in Cerulean Glade, _+1 [leather armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4)_, [_wand of cone of cold_](/Spells.aspx?ID=47) --- **AC** 31 **Fort** +19 **Ref** +21 **Will** +19 **HP** 190 **Evasion** If Rumin rolls a success on a Reflex save, he gets a critical success instead.
**Susceptible to Mockery** A character can attempt to [Feint](/Actions.aspx?ID=48) or [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=53) Rumin by mocking the fact that he hasn't yet been turned into a [vampire](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=97). On a success, in addition to the normal effects, Rumin becomes [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) (or sickened 3 on a critical success), but on a critical failure he becomes enraged and gains a +1 status bonus to Strikes and damage rolls against foes for 1 minute, during which time he can't be mocked further. --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** _light mace_ +22 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Shove](/Traits.aspx?ID=193)), **Damage** 2d4+10 bludgeoning **Arcane Spontaneous Spells** DC 30, attack +22 - **Cantrips (6th)** [Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [Mage Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=177), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280), [Telekinetic Projectile](/Spells.aspx?ID=334) - **1st** [Charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34), [Floating Disk](/Spells.aspx?ID=124), [Magic Missile](/Spells.aspx?ID=180), [Unseen Servant](/Spells.aspx?ID=352) - **2nd** [Blindness](/Spells.aspx?ID=26), [Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Glitterdust](/Spells.aspx?ID=136), [Hideous Laughter](/Spells.aspx?ID=150), [Mirror Image](/Spells.aspx?ID=197) (3 slots) - **3rd** [Haste](/Spells.aspx?ID=147), [Magic Missile](/Spells.aspx?ID=180), [Shrink Item](/Spells.aspx?ID=285) (3 slots) - **4th** [Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69), [Fly](/Spells.aspx?ID=125), [Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164), [Shatter](/Spells.aspx?ID=279) (3 slots) - **5th** [Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Hallucination](/Spells.aspx?ID=144), [Prying Eye](/Spells.aspx?ID=239), [Subconscious Suggestion](/Spells.aspx?ID=314) (3 slots) - **6th** [Disintegrate](/Spells.aspx?ID=76), [Mislead](/Spells.aspx?ID=199), [Phantasmal Killer](/Spells.aspx?ID=219) (2 slots) **Sorcerer Bloodline Spells** DC 30, attack +22, 2 Focus Points - **6th** [Ancestral Memories](/Spells.aspx?ID=493), [Extend Spell](/Spells.aspx?ID=507) **[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)** Rumin's Strikes deal an additional 2d6 precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures
